mapper.select: SELECT mr.register, mr.mileage_request_no, mr.request_is_branch, mr.request_mile_name, mr.request_mil_max, mr.request_admin, mr.request_etc, mr.request, mr.user_no, mr.mileage_request_date, mr.request_status, m.mile_no, m.mile_name FROM mileage_request mr LEFT JOIN mileage m ON mr.mile_no = m.mile_no WHERE mr.user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY mr.mileage_request_date DESC;

SELECT mr.register, mr.mileage_request_no, mr.request_is_branch, mr.request_mile_name, mr.request_mil_max, mr.request_admin, mr.request_etc, mr.request, mr.user_no, u.user_name, -- user_name을 추가 mr.mileage_request_date, mr.request_status, m.mile_no, m.mile_name FROM mileage_request mr LEFT JOIN mileage m ON mr.mile_no = m.mile_no JOIN user u ON mr.user_no = u.user_no -- user 테이블과 조인 ORDER BY mr.mileage_request_date DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE mileage_request SET register = CASE WHEN register = 0 THEN 1 ELSE register + 1 END WHERE mileage_request_no = #{num};
